text: Refresh the Demon is the fifth studio album by Canadian heavy metal band Annihilator, released on March 11, 1996 by Music for Nations. ==Track listing== ==Personnel== *Jeff Waters - Vocals, Guitars, Bass *Randy Black - Drums *Dave Davis - Guitar solos on Tracks 4, 6, 7, and 8 *Lou Bujdoso - Backing Vocals ==References== Category:1996 albums Category:Annihilator (band) albums Category:Music for Nations albums
title: Refresh the Demon
